title: Omega Squad Kled OMG that would be so cool!

replies.body: better than Omega Squad Twitch and Fizz, which is probably what we are going to get because of that damn leak that has gotten everything right so far unfortunately
Hey, Omega Squad Twitch is a great idea and tbh, he is **desperately** in need of a skin that changes his particles.
Idc about twitch he deserves a skin but fizz just got super galaxy so I call bullshit

I think Dreadnova sounds MUCH better imo. 

Omega Squad will still probably use green particles, and isn't that what we want to move away from?
if that leaked twitch skin is anywhere near the final product.  Riot really needs to demote someone.
I dont get how an Omega Squad Veigar could work

I like.
I feel like this should remain a yordle skin line
Bump, Riot needs to notice this

I think i would prefer a Dreadnova Kled bc he just fits the look..... but it still looks cool so i wouldn't mind it  

#Tacos
#BrainWeasels 
#Piecrusts
why is his axe have gun features?  that makes as much sense as an ADC buying swords when they use a bow.
Because Kled uses a gun too, so it isn't that crazy to combine them into one weapon.
SKINS THAT NEED OMEGA SQUAD 100% KLED THIS PHOTO IS AMAZING! AND POPPY!
